Replying to @networklore 2018-03-17 08:27
@networklore @Netlify @gitlab It's worth knowing that those creds never get stored by us or even hit our servers. The auth happens between your browser and gitlab and is just used while setting up the site. Also, while zip uploads get your site deployed, all the good stuff & powerful workflows depends on git.
  • Permalink
  • Twitter

Replying to @shaunbent 2018-03-16 13:58
@shaunbent That depends on the SSG you use. Most have some way of iterating over collections ordered and filtered by an attribute of your choosing. Date, title, or arbitrary attribute you create for this purpose. Some people prepends filenames with numerals (not my preference) Which SSG?
